mapper.select: select * from pboard order by pno desc
mapper.insert: insert into pboard (pcate_cd, ptitle, pcontent, ptag, ppass, pname, pdate, peditdate, pip) values (#{pcate_cd}, #{ptitle}, #{pcontent}, #{ptag}, #{ppass}, #{pname}, #{pdate}, #{peditdate}, #{pip})
mapper.update: update pboard set pcate_cd=#{pcate_cd}, ptitle=#{ptitle}, pcontent=#{pcontent}, ptag=#{ptag}, peditdate=#{peditdate} where pno=#{pno} and ppass=#{ppass}
update pcnt set pcnt=pcnt+1 where pno=#{pno}
